message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.

Hi Alice, I think a 60-40 split in my favor is more fair considering that inflation affects you but not me. If we go to another round, your share will be worth even less to you due to the 10% inflation on your side. This offer maximizes our combined utility.
Bob, it seems like you're trying to take advantage of the inflation. Let's be reasonable. This offer is still better for you than another round.
